issues_enabled.description: Flag indication if the issue tracker is enabled

merge_requests_enabled.description: Flag indication if merge requests are enabled

wiki_enabled.description: Flag indication if the wiki is enabled

builds_enabled.description: Flag indication if builds are enabled

snippets_enabled.description: Flag indication if snippets are enabled

shared_runners_enabled.description: Flag indication if shared runners are enabled for that project

container_registry_enabled.description: Flag indication if the container registry is enabled for that project

lfs_enabled.description: Flag indication if Git LFS is enabled for that project

public.description: Create a public project. The same as visibility_level = 20.

visibility_level.description: Create a public project. The same as visibility_level = 20.

request_access_enabled.description: Allow users to request member access

only_allow_merge_if_build_succeeds.description: Only allow to merge if builds succeed

only_allow_merge_if_all_discussions_are_.description: Only allow to merge if all discussions are resolved

namespace_id.description: Namespace ID for the new project. Default to the user namespace.

import_url.description: URL from which the project is imported
